name: Gilded Sentinel

specials.name: Construct Armor
specials.description: Like normal objects, the Enchanted Guardian has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage it takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once the Enchanted Guardian is reduced to less than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks, removing the Hardness and reducing its Armor Class to 15.

specials.name: Ability
specials.description:
Trigger: The Enchanted Guardian is targeted by a melee attack.
Effect: The Enchanted Guardian gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If this causes the attack to miss, the attacker becomes off-balance, taking a â€“1 penalty to AC until the end of its next turn.

specials.name: Whirling Blades
specials.description: Effect: The Enchanted Guardian spins rapidly, attacking all adjacent creatures. It makes a melee attack with its glaive against each creature within reach. Each attack counts toward its multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until all the attacks have been made.

specials.name: Arcane Resilience
specials.description: Effect: The Enchanted Guardian has resistance 5 to all magic damage.

specials.name: Reassemble
specials.traits: Trigger: The Enchanted Guardian is reduced to 0 HP.
specials.description: Effect: The Enchanted Guardian collapses into pieces but begins to reassemble itself. Unless destroyed with a critical success on a Disable Device (Thievery) or Crafting check (DC 17), it reanimates after 2d4 rounds with half its original HP.

description:
**Tactics**
*Opening Moves* The Enchanted Sentinel uses Arcane Pulse to damage and potentially weaken multiple opponents.
*Combat Strategy* It utilizes Whirling Blades to attack multiple foes and Guardian's Parry to defend against strong melee attackers.
*Defense* Relies on Arcane Resilience to mitigate magic damage and Reassemble to return to combat after being defeated.

immunity.value: Bleed, death effects, disease, doomed, drained, fatigued, healing, mental, necromancy, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poison, sickened, unconscious
